taskPrompt: Review the project state in PROJECT.md and ARCHITECTURE.md. Based on the current phase and what has been built so far, create a prioritized backlog of tasks for the next sprint. Focus on the stock transfer workflow which is the highest customer priority. Create tasks using the agentforge CLI (note: the server is not running, so you can demonstrate the commands but they will fail - that's expected). Document your task breakdown and prioritization rationale in your session notepad.
